p: Yam is the second most important crop in Africa in terms of production after cassava. Srivastava et al. ( 2015) simulated the advantages of specific adaptation strategies using the EPIC model. They found that changing solely sowing date may less effective in reducing adverse climatic effects than adopting late maturing cultivars. Yet, combining different options such as coupling irrigation and fertilizer application with late maturing cultivars, highest increase in the yields could be realized.
